summary: This video showcases a variety of dishes at a Muslim-owned HALAL steakhouse. The featured items include a "Banjir Cheese Burger" with fries, a "Premium Meat Platter" with several cuts of steak, "Angus Short Ribs with Mash," "Truffle Mushroom Pasta with Ribeye Steak," and "Oyster Blade Steak with Fried Rice."
caption: A culinary journey through a Muslim-owned HALAL steakhouse, featuring an array of decadent dishes. From juicy burgers to premium meat platters and rich pasta, this spot is a must-try for food enthusiasts.
